summary: A utility class that loads a Hugging Face pre‑trained model (sentence‑transformer or cross‑encoder) and provides high‑level operations to convert text inputs into dense vector representations or to obtain cross‑encoder predictions, handling model caching and custom configuration.
business_intent: Facilitate semantic text processing such as similarity search, clustering, recommendation, or classification by supplying ready‑to‑use embeddings and cross‑encoder scoring within applications.
